attributes.name: network.protocol.name
attributes.note: The value SHOULD be normalized to lowercase.

attributes.name: network.protocol.name
attributes.note: The value SHOULD be normalized to lowercase.

attributes.name: server.port
attributes.note: When observed from the client side, and when communicating through an intermediary, `server.port` SHOULD represent the server port behind any intermediaries, for example proxies, if it's available.

attributes.name: server.port
attributes.note:
See [Setting `server.address` and `server.port` attributes](/docs/http/http-spans.md#setting-serveraddress-and-serverport-attributes).
> **Warning**
> Since this attribute is based on HTTP headers, opting in to it may allow an attacker
> to trigger cardinality limits, degrading the usefulness of the metric.
